title: Update Hero portrait to corrected head-visible crop from uploaded photo

requirements.summary: Switch the Hero portrait to use only the newly uploaded photo (or its cropped derivative) while leaving all Hero text, CTA behavior, layout, and site sections unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero portrait displayed in the Hero section comes from the uploaded file 20230909_152253-4.jpg (or a cropped derivative generated from it), and no other portrait/stock/placeholder image is referenced for the hero.

HeroSection text content remains exactly: title "Krishna Shankar", tagline "Education Professional | Technology-Oriented | Continuous Learner", and CTA label "Email Me" with the existing mailto behavior unchanged.

file_operations.description: Update HERO_PORTRAIT_PATH to reference only the new hero portrait asset at /assets/generated/20230909_152253-4-headshot.dim_800x800.jpg (removing the old /assets/20230909_152253-3.jpg reference).

requirements.summary: Provide a clean, professional head-and-shoulders crop of the uploaded photo so the full head/face is visible and shoulders/upper torso remain, matching the existing luxury-minimal style (no effects).
acceptanceCriteria: The delivered hero portrait framing clearly includes the full head/face and retains shoulders and upper torso (no cut-off at the top of the head).
The portrait appears clean and professional with no filters, visual effects, borders, or frames.
Portrait alignment remains consistent with the existing HeroSection behavior (centered) and does not introduce layout/spacing changes beyond the image content itself.

file_operations.description: Add the edited/cropped derivative specified in the BuildRequest: head-and-shoulders corporate crop from 20230909_152253-4.jpg with full head/face visible, shoulders and upper torso retained, rotated upright if needed, and no filters/effects/borders/frames.

requirements.summary: Keep the existing Hero portrait integration mechanism intact and only update the portrait asset reference via HERO_PORTRAIT_PATH.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/config/heroPortrait.ts is the only code/config location updated to point HERO_PORTRAIT_PATH to the new portrait asset path.
The site builds and the hero portrait renders without console errors or broken image links.

file_operations.description: Ensure the integration remains unchanged by only adjusting HERO_PORTRAIT_PATH to /assets/generated/20230909_152253-4-headshot.dim_800x800.jpg; do not modify HeroSection rendering or any other section/component.
